snippet: A British man was shot dead in northern Kenya on Sunday at a private ranch in the Laikipia area, two of the man's neighbors said, and a legislator warned that local politicians were stoking violence as elections approach....

headline.main: Nearly 1,300 Rescued Migrants Arrive in Sicily Over Weekend
headline.print_headline: Nearly 1,300 Rescued Migrants Arrive in Sicily Over Weekend

lead_paragraph: A British man was shot dead in northern Kenya on Sunday at a private ranch in the Laikipia area, two of the man's neighbors said, and a legislator warned that local politicians were stoking violence as elections approach.
